Detailed Description

Show observed bitmap on the 2D-console.

This class extends standard 2D-console to provide background bitmap object.

Member Function Documentation

virtual const ibase::IHierarchicalCommand* iview::CImageViewComp::GetCommands ( ) const [virtual]

Get list of menu commands.

This commands will be integrated in global menu system undependent of actual selected view. For support of normal pull down menu, depth of this tree structure should be at least 3.

Implements ibase::ICommandsProvider.
